attributes.action: Read, consider and act upon the sensible suggestions of Poly Toynbee of Monday 7th September 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the full article refer to: http://www.guardian.co.uk/commentisfree/2009/sep/07/labour-radical-ideas-electoral-reform

Includes such suggestions as:
-PR for councils
-Referendum on PR on election day
-Introduce a quota system for gas, electricity and oil to reduce carbon emissions
-Reduce the 50% tax band to earnings over £100,000 from £150,000
-Set capital gains tax to the same level as income tax
-Attack the bonus culture in the city
-Reintroduce quotas on ownership of press and TV abolished by Thatcher
-Redress the spending on children

More than anything, set national politics alight, we should be leaders in Europe, not those who lag behind. We believe in you Labour, please do this before it is too late.

NB This was filed under Govt, politics and public administration, though it fits in all the listed categories.
